result.arabic_text: إِذۡ جَآءُوكُم مِّن فَوۡقِكُمۡ وَمِنۡ أَسۡفَلَ مِنكُمۡ وَإِذۡ زَاغَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَبَلَغَتِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ ٱلۡحَنَاجِرَ وَتَظُنُّونَ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلظُّنُونَا۠
result.translation: Yeroo gubbaa keessaniifi garjalee keessan irraa isinitti dhufan, yeroo ijjoowan jallattee (hiramtee), onneewwanis kokkeewwan geessee, Rabbitti yaada fokkataa yaaddan san [yaadadhaa].
